website_summaries.verdict: Good, but pricier, alternative if you prefer a foam over gel.
pros: Handy pump dispensers in portable-size bottles
Doesn't dry out skin because it doesn't contain alcohol
cons: Pricey, considering the bottles are so small
Can feel a little sticky when dry

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a residue and will freeze
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a residue on your hands which I do not like. These are fragrance free which is great and and the pump works great. Wish they had these with alcohol Purell. Thes will freeze if they get to cold which is inconvenient for leaving in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Works Well For Me
customer_reviews.text: No fragrance is why I picked this product since I am sensitive to scents. It does have a smell but no added fragrance. The smell does not bother me and the smell does not linger so it is gone quickly unlike scented soaps in public restrooms for example when the smell can remain for hours with some. It is small enough to carry around in your pocket if needed although I will be looking for a smaller size like 1.5 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these on hand in my car all the time. I like the foam a LOT better than the regular gel. I didn't give it 5 stars because I think it's a little overpriced, but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Compact, fits in diaper bag, purse, you name it.
customer_reviews.text: Love that the cap doesn't pop off as almost every other mini hand sanitizer I've owned does. It stays put and doesn't leak all over my purse or the diaper bag. Hands don't feel sticky after use, another plus. No complaints! NOTE: if you found this review to be helpful, click the HELPFUL button below! :)
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: FLU SEASON MUST-HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I will use foam from now on. It absorbs so fast, easy to open and apply. With the pump, you get just enough for your hands, unlike the liquid that usually takes a while to rub in after you accidentally squueze out too much of. The flu was bad this year. I carried 1 everywhere I went. There's one in the kitchen and bathroom and I encourage guests to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff. doesn't dry out my hands, I can use it with my daughter and not worry about alcohol in it to dry/sting her hands. Makes my hands feel clean when I can't wash them. Good product, would happily buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Best hand sanitizer out there.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't leave hands sticky like some do and scent doesn't knock you over like others. Nice size for my purse. No mess like some of the more watery cleaners. Yes, it's priced higher than the cheap, little ones in the discount stores, but it's worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: BeejinPA

customer_reviews.title: I really like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. I can't use the standard gel stuff very often without it making my eczema break out. I seem to be able to use this multiple times a day without it bothering me. I also like that it doesn't leave the residue on my hands that the standard stuff does.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go.
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size and I love that it's alcohol free because they do not dry your hands out. I keep them at my desk, in the car, by my bedside, etc. you get they picture. I find that I go through them quicker than other sanitizers, but I still like them. I have re-ordered and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for travel and to have in drawers throughout the house
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy pump. Good for little kids hands because it foams up nicely and doesn’t run all over like the liquidy hand sanitizers. Also it is scentless and doesn’t feel like it dries out my hands too much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentler on your hands.
customer_reviews.text: One pump for normal use. Two for heavy cleaning. Great for kids too who are sensitive to alcohol based ones. Great size for purse and car and diaper bag. Bought two packs in the last 3 months. Will buy again. Doesn’t really have much scent if any.
customer_reviews.author: Prudenteffect

customer_reviews.title: Handy size, standard quality for product
customer_reviews.text: Bottles are relatively small but good for a purse or pocket. Quality consistent with similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Deedra Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This dried my hands so severely the skin cracked and burned. Never had this reaction from other hand sanitizer and I go nowhere without it. As soon as I switched back to my previous brand problem went away.
customer_reviews.author: James Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Love these little pumps
customer_reviews.text: Love these little pumps. Doesn't dry out my hands or anything. I got these for my purse and around the house after my newborn came home from the NICU and had everyone using them before they went near her.
customer_reviews.author: Hw

customer_reviews.title: Rip off!
customer_reviews.text: These are purse sizes for 11 bucks a pop. Don’t get ripped off like we did!
customer_reviews.author: Jenniferdesmarais

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Best you’ll get I suppose if you don’t like gel. I used to use the spray which was the best but it’s been discontinued. Very sticky with residue if you use too much at once. Not overly impressed but seems to be only option besides gel. However the price is too high in my opinion. You can get other options for less.
customer_reviews.author: LoyalAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Price is unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great but the price has increased by 5 TIMES from last year!! I can’t believe each little bottle is now $9.00. That is unreal!! I will not be buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Pat G

customer_reviews.title: Great sanitizer for cleansing when skin is allergic to alcohol
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by medical staff for family member with Crohn's, allergic to alcohol. Do not leave in car in winter; without the alcohol it will freeze. Another gem--hard to find products free of alcohol for hand sanitizing.
customer_reviews.author: SacoFamily2

customer_reviews.title: Pump solves the "Purell Problem"
customer_reviews.text: Whats the Purell Problem? How many times have you tried to squeeze just the RIGHT amount?? Doesn't usually go well. The pump not only gives you a foam that sticks to your hand (and doesn't roll off) but it gives you the perfect amount with each pump. Good job...
customer_reviews.author: Steve613

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put in your bag and not leakage from the bottle like the liquids.
customer_reviews.text: I keep one in my car and like it better than the liquid. You don’t need much and dries instantly. The liquids aways leak And take forever to dry. This dries in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Toddlers and Diaper Changes on the Go
customer_reviews.text: So helpful!! I keep one in my purse, one in my diaper bag, and another on the night stand for late night/early morning diaper changes. This doesn’t dry out your skin, nor will it sting if you have a cut or broken skin. Another reason to use this instead of standard liquid/gel sanitizer is the foam doesn’t slide off a child’s hand as easily/quickly - for those moments when your child’s hand isn’t perfectly horizontal and the sanitizer ends up on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: JGo

customer_reviews.title: No alcohol
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is undergoing chemotherapy. It is essential that he have a sanitizer that not only keeps him from the germs, but is also not harsh for his skin. This fits the bill perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: ekmk

customer_reviews.title: Scent Free, Alcohol-Free Hand Sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use while abroad. I needed a non scented, alcohol-free, hand sanitizer. It served it's purpose but it did feel slightly sticky as compared to your regular hand sanitizer.
customer_reviews.author: Mahmuda Rahman

customer_reviews.title: clean and fresh
customer_reviews.text: i don't like most hand sanitizers because they leave a perfumey smell and nasty residue on your hands. This sanitizer has no smell, leaves your hands smelling clean. Comes out a little like foamed water, but soaks in pretty fast. I keep some with me all the time. Please keep making this!
customer_reviews.author: Tom's Picks

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a alcohol free hand sanitizer while my husband was taking chemo. We couldn't find one in any of our local stores. Love the ease of home delivery and buying multiples made it so easy to have a bottle handy in several places at home and in the car. Mild smell that was not overwhelming. We would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: cassie s.

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: this is the foaming stuff, the best, regular is too goooey, buy it and you will love it. bath and body works sells these too for way more money
customer_reviews.author: Henry Morinowski

customer_reviews.title: like the foam
customer_reviews.text: The foam is great! it doesnt slip off your hands and create a mess! also my kid loves the bottle so less of a fight to clean there hands
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this type of foaming hand sanitizer. It dries super quick and doesn’t dry your hands out. They can also be refilled but eventually the pump gets a little stiff so I reorder these once they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Ida May

customer_reviews.title: No stickiness or gross smell
customer_reviews.text: I got this to carry in my backpack while grocery shopping. I always hated normal hand sanitizer because of the smell and the way your hands feel after. These are a good size for keeping anywhere and have quite a bit of product in them. They smell like brand new powder makeup, like that subtle clean smell.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and have ordered twice....Foam is wonderful. Would like it even more if it was a little smaller so it would fit easily in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: AmyCha

customer_reviews.title: love this version
customer_reviews.text: Love the no alcohol and how the foam dissipates quickly. Love the travel size packaging. and will definitely buy this version again. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Non drying!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't dry out my hands! I can't speak to how effective it is on germs, but I haven't gotten sick in the 3 months I've been using
customer_reviews.author: mariroo

customer_reviews.title: cost of product
customer_reviews.text: $99 for thee units of 1.5 FL OZ each! And Amazon will not allow me to return!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia K. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: These are good for my family as they are put-off by the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are good for my family as they are put-off by the strong smell of alcohol in the regular Purell - it makes their eyes water. We do not have this problem with this product. Also - it is in a small enough container to put in a purse or small pocket of a bag to take along with you.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: clean
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Not watery like some of the other hand foams I have used in the past. Close as you will get in a portable to the same stuff they use in hospitals. Great price for getting 3 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ryan Watts

customer_reviews.title: Good product and size
customer_reviews.text: Love the size to carry in bags and my purse. The only concern is it can feel sticky before drying.
customer_reviews.author: Swin3

customer_reviews.title: A Must!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Absolutely worth the price, it is convenient and does the work. I carry one around with me at all times especially when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Pavna M.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of the alcohol gel type, they sting my hand due to a small wound, so i got these foam ones, so far so good! Like the size, i got these to carry around in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't disinfect
customer_reviews.text: Disinfectant needs to have 60% alcohol. I don't understand a hand sanitizer without alcohol. It feels great on your hands, but I want to use a product that I know is killing germs.
customer_reviews.author: rsatx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to keep in the car
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to keep in the car, my purse or the office. I like the design because I don't need to worry about them leaking like those gel bottle sanitizers. Thank you Purell!
customer_reviews.author: kittiecr

customer_reviews.title: Good product, use it and don't spread your germs
customer_reviews.text: I like that this has a nice feeling to it. I don't think it feels greasy at all, and it doesn't dry out my skin. I use this all day wherever I go. The flue season is here and it's important to take care of yourself and others around you. Don't spread your germs!
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Missing contents
customer_reviews.text: When I opened box one was completely empty in the three pack. Another was full and the third was about 3/4 full. I even tried to squeeze the empty one to make sure I wasn't imagining it, but nope it was empty. :(
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing NO SCENT hand sanitizer!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged and NO SCENT! Love this product and will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: It's Purell
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? It's Purell. It's compact enough to make it transportable.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Get the job done but a weird scent and consistency remaining after you rub it in
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Will last me for the next year. Does not leave a sticky feeling. Made my hands feel softer.
customer_reviews.author: RAH

customer_reviews.title: Don’t spend the rip-off money
customer_reviews.text: An extreme rip-off. Additionally, each bottle states on its label: not for individual retail!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb S.

customer_reviews.title: great sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: I have found the foam sanitizer work better for me stays in place as you put your container aside.
customer_reviews.author: dnarekim

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Easy control of how much foam comes out. Very little waist.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids loved them
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love foam hand sanitizer and these were just what they wanted for school bags and cars.
customer_reviews.author: Kidcare Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Good for winter
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my daughter and school germs. They don’t dry out her hands
customer_reviews.author: Be-you-2

customer_reviews.title: Get this if you visit dog parks!
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it’s travel friendly, great for the car door and perfect in a pinch!
customer_reviews.author: April Germono

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good sanitizer in a good size bottle.easy to fit in a diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: chandan

customer_reviews.title: I like foam sanitizers better than gel.
customer_reviews.text: If you want hand sanitizer and don't like the small containers of gel, this is for you. It is very portable and foam is like you find in many places today including offices and supermarkets.
customer_reviews.author: Vermont Senior

customer_reviews.title: Great for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Easy on the go with three kids under 4! It doesn’t dry out your hands like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: Purell foam in 3 pack was nice to have around in cars purse and bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Purell foam in 3 pack was nice to have around in cars purse and bathroom .We like to be able to disinfect our hands at anytime we need to.Works so good.Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amkathybarrettmayazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its safe
customer_reviews.text: i have this in my purse, car, house and at work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids! My son has one on his backpack for school and I have to replace it constantly because he loves to use this foaming hand sanitizer and I don’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: VSGMOM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep in my purse for use on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Eidenschink

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than Alcohol-based Hand Sanitizers
customer_reviews.text: Very handy size to keep around the house or in the car or to carry around. I got tired of the alcohol-based sanitizers. The foam doesn't dry out the skin. I already have replaced the first batch and will continue to do so over time.
customer_reviews.author: seb3

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Convenient containers and a product that doesn't dry out your hands. I should carry these around more often, but I make sure to always have them with me when I'm at a convention or other large public gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Kikuchi

customer_reviews.title: Purell foam hand sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: Great to take along for purse, car, diaper bag, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the gel.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the car. I like the consistency of the foam way better than the gel. Good Stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Castle

customer_reviews.title: Flu germs be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I always carry one of these in my purse. Simple and effective. One pump of foam is all that you need.
customer_reviews.author: Pandoras Box

customer_reviews.title: Have always love this product glad I found it on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Have always love this product glad I found it on amazon. I've been looking for it for a couple of years. No alcohol so doesn't dry. Out my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Hms

customer_reviews.title: Handy bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Great sized bottle, love Purell. Does not dry your hands after use. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Lids Fall Off
customer_reviews.text: These are a portable size, but the lids pop off too easily to put them in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jordon Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Must have for travel and cold/flu season!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for glove compartments, hand bags or backpacks! The foam is so much better than the standard gel.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F

customer_reviews.title: very little for the amount of money.
customer_reviews.text: very little product in each hand dispenser. wont last you long at all for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: During flu season we had these in cars and purses. Great size. Prefer foam over gel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the foam and that there isn't any alcohol in it! Evaporates and leaves my hands soft without any residue and no smell!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the germs at bay..
customer_reviews.text: Like the small bottle can be placed in various locations. Car, Purse, Gym bag, Etc.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda C.

customer_reviews.title: You will only receive 3 bottles...not a case!
customer_reviews.text: The ad for this is highly deceiving. Only 3 pump bottles were received, not a case of 24. Paying $5 apiece for each bottle is exorbitant. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: great choice if you are looking for "Alcohol Free" hand sanitizer.
customer_reviews.text: I love this size for my purse..and I really like the foam when using Purell. seems very gentle on my hand"s too. very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good Stocking Stuffers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these during the Christmas season for stockings of the adults in my family. Perfect for the purse, or the glove box of a car. They all loved it!
customer_reviews.author: VGSB

customer_reviews.title: Fits in palm to fingertips, non scented which is great for my kids and asthmatic cat who can’t stand the smell of anything.
customer_reviews.text: These were a steal for the add on item price. I always keep one on my or within reach. They are so compact.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Needed no alcohol for my kids
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Needed no alcohol for my kids, since we can't use alcohol based sanitizers. It works great and the kids love the foam.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: My husband has stage 4 bladder cancer and can't stand ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has stage 4 bladder cancer and can't stand smells so I bought this for him and he loves it. I'm gona buy more now.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Harper

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema on the palm of my hands. Was recommended by my dermatologist & it was a great find. Doesn't burn, no alcohol and doesn't dry my hands out
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: You will either love it or hate it.
customer_reviews.text: Personal my favorite with sensitive skin but my boyfriend complains that it dries his hands out and leaves them sticky. I guess you will either love it or hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mayer

customer_reviews.title: no smell and works well, small and handy but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: I love these because they don't have a smell, they pump the right amount and they are small enough to fit anywhere. My only complaint is that they are kinda pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Health
customer_reviews.text: I like it that it's alcohol free but I don't like the price, probably won't be them again
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Good product...though a little small. Quick, good service from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Al Left

customer_reviews.title: disappointing  very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: evaporated out of one already before it was opened WTH
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: works instantly to clean our hands especially when we go to a buffet.
customer_reviews.author: janpeachespotter

customer_reviews.title: Great foaming hand cleaner for when youre on the go
customer_reviews.text: Great foaming hand cleaner for when youre on the go. Doesn't use Alcohol, but a Quat. Either choice is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect to carry in my purse
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old kept complaining that other hand sanitizers burned her cuts. This was perfect to carry in my purse, a diaper bag and the car.
customer_reviews.author: Phil McCrackin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: does not feel like pure. my hands felt gross after applying.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: The packaging of the product
customer_reviews.text: The products leaked when delivered to me. Of the three bottles, one is only half left, one is 2/3 left while only one seems ok.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Wong

customer_reviews.title: Superior to alcohol-based sanitizers
customer_reviews.text: Great size to carry in a travel bag on a plane. This product is superior to alcohol sanitizer and doesn't dry out your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Robin

customer_reviews.title: Foamy goodness
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's hand sani. I can't prove that it works, but I'm not ill, so.... Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: I love purell. I bought it for my son
customer_reviews.text: I love purell . I bought it for my son. Easy to use. Doesn't drop on the floor like the gel sanitizer. I am happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Pooja Goel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The items were smaller than I anticipated but are a convenient size for the purse and travel bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cap opens easily. And it leaks all over my purse. But the product is good
customer_reviews.author: AMAZONATOR

customer_reviews.title: Good option for people who are sensitive to alcohol.
customer_reviews.text: I like having hand sanitizer in my bag, but I have eczema and I am unable to use regular hand sanitizers which contain alcohol. This product is a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very mild and does not contain alcohol that burns the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Forslind

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Perfect for travel and you waste less because it foams!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley n travis

customer_reviews.title: hand sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: ordered as a back to school gift--items as described and shipped quickly
customer_reviews.author: Melanie B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Took these hiking with us and I loved how portable they were. And the fact that it was foam.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Car
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the car. After taking the trash over I feel like my hands are really clean again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Nichols

product_meta.title: PURELL SF607 Hand Sanitizer Foam, Alcohol Free Formulation, 45 mL Portable, Travel Sized Pump Bottle (Pack of 3) – 5684-08-EC
product_meta.description: PURELL non-alcohol formulation hand sanitizer, 1.5 oz./45 mL pump bottle, is an antimicrobial foam with benzalkonium chloride (BAK) to help reduce the number of germs on hands. The pump bottle dispenses small amounts of foam at a time. This hand sanitizer is free of alcohol, fragrances, and dyes.
feature_bullets: GERM KILLER: Non-Alcohol formula kills 99.99 percent of most common germs that may cause illness
ALCOHOL-FREE SOLUTION: Foam hand sanitizer without alcohol, fragrances, and dyes
FRAGRANCE FREE: Dye-Free and Fragrance-Free solution leaves hands feeling soft
CONVENIENT: Easy to use alcohol-free hand sanitizer that provides quick, portable product access
TRUSTED BRAND: Purell is the most trusted and used hand sanitizer by hospitals and clinically proven effective in maintaining skin health

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
